title: Capes

replies.body:
I still have my Optifine cape.

Also, Mojang isn't banning capes because they give a player an advantage (they don't), but because they want capes to only be able to be receivable from Minecon, they want to keep capes special.

We just have to face it. Mojang is being a money w̶h̶o̶r̶e̶ and want more people to go to minecon to get a cape and give the company more money.
